https://tmrev.io/movie/259610-Bastards 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bVjjPVd2nHs4Kfwt9JkT3nGjewR.jpg At 14 Rabha El Haimer was an illiterate child bride, beaten, raped and then rejected. Ten years later, she is a single mother, fighting to legalise her sham marriage and secure a future for her illegitimate daughter. With unprecedented access to the Moroccan justice system, “Bastards” follows Rabha’s fight from the Casablanca slums to the high courts. Bastards
